CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE categories (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT UNIQUE, risk TEXT, liquidity TEXT, createdAt DATETIME, updatedAt DATETIME)
SELECT_BY_QUERY: SELECT * FROM categories WHERE name LIKE '%' || $query || '%'
INSERT: INSERT INTO categories (name, risk, liquidity, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES ($name, $risk, $liquidity, $createdAt, $updatedAt)
UPDATE: UPDATE categories SET name = $name, risk = $risk, liquidity = $liquidity, updatedAt = $updatedAt WHERE id = $id
